definition: old variant of 曆|历[li4]/old variant of 歷|历[li4]
history/annals/title of an official historian in ancient China
building/shop/term for certain service establishments/embassy or consulate/schoolroom (old)/CL:家[jia1]

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Li4 shi3 Bo2 wu4 guan3

sentences.english: A Tyrannosaurus rex model at the Natural History Museum in London.
sentences.chinese: 伦敦自然历史博物馆的霸王龙模型。

sentences.english: The Museum of Chinese Revolution is on the right of Tiananmen Squre.
sentences.chinese: 中国革命历史博物馆就在天安门广场的右侧。

sentences.english: Its natural-history museum alone holds 12m specimens.
sentences.chinese: 单是该校自然历史博物馆便藏有1200万份标本。

sentences.english: The National Museum of American History has more than three million objects in its complete collection.
sentences.chinese: 国立美国历史博物馆拥有三百多万件藏品。

sentences.english: It was next to sublime History Museum and across the River Reuss .
sentences.chinese: 它紧邻庄严的历史博物馆，也横跨过卢埃斯河。

sentences.english: Acapulco Museum of History is the location of the ancient fortress of San Diego.
sentences.chinese: 阿卡普尔科历史博物馆的所在地是古老的圣迪戈要塞。

sentences.english: For example, the Natural History Museum still has Azendohsaurus in its dinosaur directory.
sentences.chinese: 例如国家历史博物馆依然将爱珍多龙归为恐龙类。

sentences.english: The Museum of Natural History had a special live spiders exhibit, featuring an appearance by Spidey himself.
sentences.chinese: 自然历史博物馆前有蜘蛛侠本人出席的现场展览。

sentences.english: There is a 37 –metre-long road on the right of the History Museum.
sentences.chinese: 在历史博物馆的右边有个37米长的马路。

sentences.english: Dear passengers, east in front of us is the Hangzhou History Museum which is built near the hill.
sentences.chinese: 在东侧上方依山而建的是杭州历史博物馆。

sentences.english: There's a 37-metre-long road on the right of the history museum.
sentences.chinese: 在历史博物馆的右边有个37米长的马路。

sentences.english: Would you like to go to the natural history museum with me?
sentences.chinese: 自然历史博物馆，赫什霍恩现代艺术馆。

sentences.english: Katsushika City Museum is the museum of local history and astronomy.
sentences.chinese: 葛饰区乡土天文馆是一所地方历史博物馆和天文馆。

definition: to collect in a museum or library/museum collection/library holdings

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Guo2 jia1 Bo2 wu4 guan3

definition: places of historic interest/historical sites/CL:個|个[ge4]
